ESHP170.name: Startup: Business Model Development
ESHP170.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESHP170.description: Moving new concepts from idea to prototype in support of developing market value.

ESHP190.name: The Art of Starting
ESHP190.description: Aspects of the entrepreneurial experience. The entrepreneurial mindset and the venture creation process. Foundation for getting a venture started, and understanding of what it takes to be an entrepreneur.

ESHP202.name: Entrepreneurship Abroad
ESHP202.description: Explores the entrepreneurial mindset through the lens of a different culture and different business norms through study abroad.

ESHP230.name: The Entrepreneurial Mindset
ESHP230.description: Components of entrepreneurship mindset. Steps in venture creation and idea generation. Methods for opportunity analysis and voice of consumer.

ESHP231.name: Venture Launch
ESHP231.semester: Fall of every year, Summer of every year
ESHP231.description: Creating a minimum viable product. Market testing. Building a basic business model. Developing and executing a launch plan.

ESHP380.name: Entrepreneurship: Planning, Modeling, and Adaptive Execution
ESHP380.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ESHP380.description: Strategies for successful entrepreneurship, customer development process, risk mitigation procedures, new product development process, adaptive execution, engaging the marketplace.
ESHP380.restrictions: Open to students in the Entrepreneurship and Innovation Minor.

ESHP480.name: Entrepreneurship Capstone Experience
ESHP480.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ESHP480.description: Entrepreneurship and business development projects. Defining marketing intangibles. Defining scope of work. Engagement management. Preparing deliverables for entrepreneurial firms. Working with entrepreneurs to solve real problems ranging from initial visioning and planning to grow to size.
ESHP480.prerequisite: ESHP 190 or MGT 352 or CAS 114 or approval of department
ESHP480.restrictions: Open to students in the Entrepreneurship and Innovation Minor.

ESHP490.name: Independent Study in Entrepreneurship
ESHP490.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESHP490.description: Supervised program of independent research and application, in areas related to entrepreneurship and innovation.

ESHP491.name: Special Topics in Entrepreneurship
ESHP491.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESHP491.description: Current and emerging topics in entrepreneurship and innovation.
